title: Now for a patented yellow idea/rant, Wheres my god damn 1v1 queue.
body:
With the number of scrublords i have to 1v1 to prove to them why they should listen to me when we play ranked ive come to find 1v1 is a much better way to determine individual skill levels, namely in 5v5 i can still win against a challenger if i hold the game out long enough and try my damned hardest, 1v1 id be crushed so hard id become human peanut butter extra smooth with less chunks, hell 1v1 id be crushed so hard id actually get the lose screen as soon as hovering my mouse over the play button while thinking of queueing, And thats how it should be. i should feel like im paper 7 when i fight someone clearly stronger than me.

I SHOULDNT feel like im mid silver in the middle of a bronze game and that my team is holding me down, thats not healthy for the state of play.

Id rather go up against someone mono e mono and get crushed like the retard i am, than go up against a team of 5 retards and feel like a god because i got lucky and went up against the one retard on their team and used his deaths to steam roll the other 4.

replies.body:
Just like every other unique game mode that comes out, this one would be popular at first but then die out over time.

I'm not saying its a bad idea, everyone loves some good 1 on 1 action, but I don't think it would work in the long run. 

Plus, there's always Custom Mode if you want to 1v1 someone :D
